description: Taught students the programming fundamentals in JavaScript and Python by developing games.
Worked with and lead a team that is dedicated to game development and involved in game jams!
Participate in Google Developer Student Club events and workshops to learn about new technologies. Currently a part of the McMaster University Solutions Incubator program.
Participated in DECA case study competitions and reached the provincial competition level.
Worked with other volunteers to read with kids from ages 7-11 helping and motivating them to read.
